TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CertificateSubjectPublicKeyInfoValidator extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Owin.Security.ICertificateValidator

Docs.summary: Implements a cert pinning validator passed on http://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-ietf-websec-key-pinning/?include_text=1

Docs.param: A collection of valid base64 encoded hashes of the certificate public key information blob.

Docs.param: An object that contains state information for this validation.
The certificate used to authenticate the remote party.
The chain of certificate authorities associated with the remote certificate.
One or more errors associated with the remote certificate.
Docs.summary: Validates at least one SPKI hash is known.
Docs.returns: A Boolean value that determines whether the specified certificate is accepted for authentication.
